page.title: 05 Roads in Boars Hill area
page.content: The Boars Hill area is linked, in the main by country roads and lanes providing routes from the area to the adjacent towns of Abingdon and Oxford. There is one major motorway (A.34) passing through the eastern part of the area, this road carries heavy traffic between the North and South of England. At Hinksey the A.34 links into the Oxford ring road designed to alleviate traffic congestion in the city centre. A park and ride system operates, motorists park their cars free of charge and travel by shuttle bus into the city. This service is well used at all times.
